wikipedia_page.main: John Love Jones (1885 – 21 December 1913) was a Welsh footballer who played in the Football League for Stoke and Middlesbrough, and he also made two appearances for Wales.

response: *John Love Jones (1885–1913), Stoke F.C., Middlesbrough F.C. and Wales international footballer
